meta_title: What is FRACAS? The Definitive 2026 Reliability Framework
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime stems from recurring failures. Define FRACAS as your facility's immune system and implement a closed-loop system in under 14 days.
title: Define FRACAS: The Closed-Loop Framework for Eliminating Industrial Downtime
